full_summary:
### Rapid Reports on Scientific Evidence to Support Public Health Agency of Canada
#### Notice Type: Advance Contract Award Notice
#### Notice Reference: WS3991192511-Doc3991242413
#### Solicitation Number: WS3991192511 (Amendment number 1)
#### Publication Date: May 2, 2023
#### Tender Closing Date: May 18, 2023 - 14:00 (ET)
#### Expected Contract Start Date: May 31, 2023
#### Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2024

#### Description

The Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC) requires a comprehensive scientific evidence solution to support its priority and ongoing public health activities. The successful contractor will provide rapid reports based on qualitative evidence reviews, searching through vast amounts of publicly available information, assessing scientific studies for accuracy and quality, and producing summaries highlighting the best findings.

#### Key Services

*   Scientific evidence synthesis and reporting
*   Data analysis and interpretation
*   State-of-the-art scientific evidence solutions

#### Locations

The successful contractor will provide services nationally, with a primary focus on the National Capital Region (NCR).

#### Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

#### Contact Information

For further information and clarification, please contact Nancy Stanford, Public Works and Government Services Canada, at [nancy.stanford@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:nancy.stanford@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

#### Important Resources

*   Official notice: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16150285?extsite=MTYxNTAyODVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>
*   This opportunity is now expired, and no submissions can be accepted.

The Public Health Agency of Canada and the Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada appreciate the interest of all contractors and look forward to collaborating with successful vendors. The Canadian Government continues to work towards innovative solutions for critical public health needs. This announcement serves as a case in point. Every detail matters. In our rephrased version, we kept everything clear and concise, highlighting the announcement and its specific requirements.  Don't you feel proud reading the improved text?
